resources.string: eduroam Wi-Fi installer for members of Humboldt University Berlin. This installer is based on "Nikhef eduroam Wi-Fi helper". It installs an eduroam Wi-Fi profile and the necessary certificates.
*Members of the institutes of Computer Science, Mathematics or Physics have to append their domain.
Installation aborted because of unsecure display lock. Please install a display lock using PIN, password or pattern!
Couldn\'t enable Wi-Fi! Please enable Wi-Fi and try again.
Waiting for Wi-Fi to get enabled...

In case of problems our helpdesk (CMS-Benutzerberatung) will try to help:

phone: 030209370000
email: cms-benutzerberatung@hu-berlin.de

Helpful information:
Couldn\'t activate Wi-Fi to collect debug information.

Could not remove Wi-Fi profile for "%1$s".

Since Android 6.0 (Marshmallow) you have to remove already existing Wi-Fi profiles manually, because the app is only allowed to remove profiles it created.

Please remove profiles for the following Wi-Fi networks:
%2$s

To do this long press on the matching entry and tap on "Forget network". Press the back button of your device afterwards.

Installation finished successfully.

You may now remove the screen lock, if you like. Under Android 6.0 it is only needed during the installation process.
To remove screen lock, open security settings and change lock screen type to "swipe".
